author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created an immersive sound design for this rare footage of American cities in the 1930s. This video offers a vivid journey through time, showcasing life in New York City, Washington D.C., Chicago, San Francisco, Hawaii, Albuquerque, New Mexico, and Arizona as it was nearly a century ago.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: Internet Archive (BMA)

title: 1930s America in Color, View of Cities [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
